description: Three format mismatches between generation and replay: (1) close reason is formatted as reason=%q but replayClose always passes empty string — parse and forward it. (2) update description is encoded as literal 'description=...' — encode the actual value (quoted) and add case 'description' to replayUpdate. (3) update defer is encoded as 'defer=<date>' but replayUpdate has no case for it — add handling for defer key. Also handle DeferUntil in create intent for issues created with --defer.
title: Fix close reason, description, and defer in intent encoding/parsing
